data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tomikawa, Ko, Soh, Ho Young, Kobayashi, Norio, Yamaguchi, Aika (2014): Taxonomic relationship between two Gammarus species, G. nipponensis and G. sobaegensis (Amphipoda: Gammaridae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 3873 (5): 451-476, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.5.1
